titleStmt.title: A Merry dialogue betwen Thomas and John. In the praise, and dispraise of women, and wine. : Thomas against the women doth contend ... To a gallant delightful new tune, well known amongst musitianers, and in play-houses, called, Women and wine.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Williamson, at the Sun and Bible in the new buildings, on London-bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
